id.description: The globally unique identifier of the service. Reverse domain name notation is used as id.

type.description: The DRS package information follows GA4GH specification.

organization.description: The information of the organization, which provides DRS API implementation.

contactUrl.description: The contact url of the organization.

documentationUrl.description: The url of supporting document for the service.

createdAt.description: The creation date of the Drs services.

updatedAt.description: The update date of the Drs services.

environment.description: The environment of the service in which its up and running.

version.description: The version of software in which Drs services released.

url.description: The Drs API's base url for the provider of service.
